Agora Trade

Agora Trade is a cross-chain, non-custodial, cryptocurrency exchange.

For more information see:

  • agora.trade
  • techical paper

Developers get involved:

  • bounties.network
  • angel.co/trinkler-software-ag

Our code is open-source:

  • agora-htlcs
  • agora-swap

Liquidity providers see:

  • api.agora.trade
  • company@trinkler.software

Agora Trade is operated by Agora Trade Limited. Home in “Blockchain Island” Valletta, Malta. Developed with ❤ in “Crypto Valley” Zug, Switzerland by Trinkler Software.
